names.bio: Frank Welker was born on March 12, 1946 in Denver, Colorado, USA as Franklin Wendell Welker. He is an actor, known for Aladdin (1992), The Real Ghostbusters (1986) and The Smurfs (1981).
names.name: Frank Welker
